Release Notes for emotas CANopen
Software for STM32, Expansion for STM32Cube
I-CUBE-CANOPEN
 Copyright © 2022 emotas embedded communication GmbH
This software expansion for STM32Cube contains
a limited emotas CANopen slave library for evaluation purposes.
Please note the known limitations below!

Before you start, read the
emotas CANopen getting started Guide

Please also have a look into the user manual.

  • emotas CANopen Library License Text

  • Examples
    • simple emotas CANopen slave example for NUCLEO-G431RB
Development Toolchains and Compilers
  • STM32CubeIDE 1.8.0 or higher
  • IAR Embedded Workbench for ARM (EWARM) toolchain v8.00 and higher
  • Keil uVision (MDK-ARM) toolchain v5.00 and higher
Supported Devices
  • STM32 Devices with integrated MCAN Controller  (STM32MP1 not supported)
Known Limitations
  • Limited runtime of approximately 60 minutes.
  • The CANopen services included in the library are limited to:
    • 1 SDO server
    • NMT slave
    • LSS slave
    • 4 Receive  PDOs with dynamic mapping
    • 4 Transmit PDOs with dynamic mapping
    • 3 Heartbeat consumer
    • Heartbeat producer
    • 3 EMCY consumer
    • EMCY producer
    • SYNC consumer
    • SYNC producer
